document_data.name: Sindari
document_data.mainbody: '''Sindari''' was a poisonous herb native to [[Thay]].
document_data.Uses: This herb was used to make a [[poison]].
document_data.Effects: It was a powerful poison. It showed no effects for 24 hours, and then, after the time had elapsed, the victim would go into violent seizures. Death was expected in a couple of minutes.
